first_translate: now that everyone has quieted down,
second_translate: now that everyone has quieted down...
label: now that you’ve all calmed  down,

first_translate: I will continue with the proceedings.
second_translate: ...I will continue with the proceedings.
label: I’ll resume  the proceedings.

first_translate: three days ago, you caused a disturbance at a bar...
second_translate: three days ago, you caused a disturbance at a bar...
label: three days  ago, you caused a disturbance at an ale house,

hangle: 남성 5인 폭행 및 금품 상당수 갈취….
first_translate: ...and assaulted five men, stealing a large amount of their money...
second_translate: ...and assaulted five men, stealing a large amount of their money...
label: assaulted five men, and stole their valuables...

first_translate: that girl...
second_translate: that girl...
label: I can’t believe this.

first_translate: so the rumors about the mage fighting on the second wall...
second_translate: so the rumors about the mage fighting on the second wall...
label: so all  that talk about  her being a mage protecting the second rampart was...

first_translate: ...were true.
second_translate: ...were true.
label: ...true.

first_translate: she’s on a completely different level from other mages.
second_translate: She's on a completely different level from other mages.
label: she’s nothing like the mages I’ve seen before.

hangle: 손에서 주먹만 한 불덩이를 만드는 건 봤어도,
first_translate: I’ve seen mages create fireballs the size of a fist,
second_translate: I’ve seen mages create fireballs the size of a fist...
label: there were plenty who could make fireballs the size of fists,

hangle: 피오나처럼 저 정도 현상을 만드는 마법사는 처음이야.
first_translate: but I’ve never seen a mage who can create such a phenomenon like fiona.
second_translate: ...but I’ve never seen a mage who can create such a phenomenon like fiona.
label: but none of them were able to create a phenomenon of that caliber.

hangle: 헤일론 공작이 데리고 있는 이유를 알 것 같아.
first_translate: I think I understand why duke heylon brought her here...
second_translate: I think I understand why duke heylon brought her here...
label: I can finally  see why duke heylon has been keeping her around,

first_translate: and two weeks ago...
second_translate: and two weeks ago...
label: and a couple of weeks ago…

first_translate: and...
label: and why...

first_translate: ...and what he’s after.
second_translate: ...what he’s after.
label: …he sent fiona here in his stead.

hangle: 우락부락한 체격의 남자 앞에 당당히 선 작은 소녀.
first_translate: a small girl stands confidently in front of a burly man.
second_translate: A small girl stands confidently in front of a burly man.
label: the sight of a little girl boldly standing before those  burly men...

first_translate: no matter what happens here,
second_translate: no matter what happens here...
label: ...is going to leave  a very, very strong impression...

hangle: 사람들은 이 모습을 똑똑히 기억할게 틀림없다.
first_translate: people will remember this scene.
second_translate: ...people will remember this scene.
label: ...on these people.

hangle: 피오나는 사람들에게 평범한 소녀가 아니라고 각인될 것이고
first_translate: fiona will be imprinted in their minds as an extraordinary girl,
second_translate: fiona will be imprinted in their minds as an extraordinary girl...
label: it will be ingrained  in their minds that fiona isn’t an ordinary girl,

hangle: 그 소문은 영지 전체에 퍼져나갈 것이다.
first_translate: and that rumor will spread throughout the entire territory.
second_translate: ...and that rumor will spread throughout the entire territory.
label: and rumors about her will spread across the domain.

first_translate: on top of that,
second_translate: on top of that...
label: on top of that,

hangle: 헤일론 성에서 피오나의 대우는 단순히 귀한 병사라기엔 매우 좋다.
first_translate: the way fiona is treated at heylon manor is too good to be considered a mere soldier.
second_translate: ...the way fiona is treated at heylon manor is too good to be considered a mere soldier.
label: everyone at heylon castle treated fiona far better than they would a regular soldier.

first_translate: mm, this is delicious!
second_translate: Mm~ this is delicious!
label: mm, it’s delicious!

first_translate: miss fiona, I brought the books you like.
second_translate: Miss Fiona, I brought the books you like.
label: lady fiona,  I brought you your favorite books.

hangle: …공작이 아무런 이유 없이 그럴 남자가 아닌데.
first_translate: but the duke isn’t the type of man to do that without reason...
second_translate: but the duke isn’t the type of man to do that without reason...
label: duke heylon  would never have ordered that without a good reason.

hangle: 아벨 헤일론 공작이 피오나에게 원하는 건 대체 뭘까?
first_translate: what exactly does duke abel heylon want from fiona?
second_translate: ...what exactly does duke abel heylon want from fiona?
label: what does he want from fiona?

hangle: …하지만 내가 이 문제에 대한 답을 알 수 있을까.
first_translate: but will I be able to find the answer to that question?
second_translate: but will I be able to find the answer to that question...
label: will I ever be able to find the answers to these questions?

hangle: 나는 용병단의 널리고 널린 고아 소년이야.
first_translate: I’m just an orphan boy in a mercenary group.
second_translate: ...I’m just an orphan boy in a mercenary group...
label: I’m just a ordinary orphan working as a mercenary.

hangle: 피오나를 위해 할 수 있는 일은 없겠지….
first_translate: there’s nothing I can do for fiona...
second_translate: ...there’s nothing I can do for fiona...
label: there’s probably nothing that I can possibly do  for fiona.

hangle: 이후에 피오나의 얼굴이나 볼 수 있을까?
first_translate: will I even be able to see her again?
second_translate: Will I even get to see Fiona's face again?
label: honestly, I don’t know  if I can look at her in the eyes after this.

first_translate: she said we should be friends,
second_translate: she said we should be friends...
label: she did say we should be friends,

hangle: 성으로 돌아가면 나 같은 건 잊어버릴지도 몰라….
first_translate: but she might forget about me once she returns to the manor...
second_translate: ...but she might forget about me once she returns to the manor...
label: but once she returns to the castle, she might forget someone like me.

first_translate: so I will give you two options.
second_translate: So, I'm giving you two choices as a result of your actions.
label: so I will  let you choose between two options.

hangle: 첫 번째는 맨몸으로 성벽 밖으로 나가는 것.
first_translate: the first is to leave the castle walls with nothing but the clothes on your back.
second_translate: The first option is that you leave the castle walls unarmed.
label: the first is for  all of you to leave this place without your weapons and supplies.

first_translate: w-what?!
second_translate: What did you just say?!
label: wh-what?!

first_translate: the second is...
second_translate: the second is...
label: the second is...

first_translate: ...that part.
second_translate: ...that part...
label: ...for you  to cut off...

first_translate: you can cut it off.
second_translate: ...cut it off.
label: ...that part.

first_translate: what?!
second_translate: What the hell?!
label: whaaat?!

first_translate: huh...
second_translate: huh...
label: oh, dear.

hangle: 설마 이 정도 처벌도 예상 못한 걸까?
first_translate: did they really not expect this kind of punishment?
second_translate: did they really not expect this kind of punishment?
label: perhaps they weren’t ready for something that extreme.

hangle: 물론 저도 여러분께 최소한의 자비는 줄 예정이랍니다.
first_translate: of course, I will show you a little mercy.
second_translate: Of course, I will show you a little mercy.
label: of course,  I am willing to show you a bit of mercy.

first_translate: you can either leave or cut it off.
second_translate: Either get out or cut it off.
label: leave this place, or cut off your privates.

first_translate: the choice is yours.
second_translate: It's up to you to choose.
label: the choice is yours.

first_translate: ugh...
second_translate: ugh...
label: hgh…

hangle: 웃기지 마! 우리가 왜 그런 꼴을 당해야 해?!
first_translate: don’t be ridiculous! why should we have to suffer such a fate?!
second_translate: Don't be ridiculous! Why should we have to go through something like that?!
label: screw this!  why should we agree to your demands?!

hangle: 하여간 야만적이고 미개한 북부 놈들하고는 상종을 하면 안 돼….
first_translate: we shouldn’t have gotten involved with those barbaric and uncivilized northerners...
second_translate: we shouldn’t have gotten involved with those barbaric and uncivilized northerners...
label: this is why one should never do business with savage and ignorant northerners.

hangle: 우리 용병들이 없으면 마물 배 속에나 들어가 있을 것들이!
first_translate: they’d be in the bellies of monsters if it weren’t for us mercenaries!
second_translate: They would be in the bellies of monsters if it weren't for us mercenaries!
label: all of you would’ve ended up inside those monsters’ bellies if it weren’t for us mercenaries!

first_translate: how dare he...
second_translate: how dare he...
label: how dare he…!

hangle: …헤일론 영지는 용병들에게 위험에 상응하는 금액을 치릅니다.
first_translate: heylon pays mercenaries an amount that corresponds to the danger they face.
second_translate: heylon pays mercenaries an amount that corresponds to the danger they face...
label: the duke of heylon pays mercenaries handsomely for  the risks they  take.

first_translate: abel is cold but fair.
second_translate: ...abel is cold but fair...
label: abel may be cold, but he’s fair.

hangle: 마물을 잡는 위험을 감수하는 만큼 보수를 지불한다.
first_translate: he pays them for the risk they take in hunting monsters.
second_translate: ...he pays them for the risk they take in hunting monsters.
label: mercenaries are always rewarded well because fighting demonic monsters is a dangerous job.

hangle: 게다가 용병들에겐 마물의 사체에서 얻을 수 있는 재료도 있다.
first_translate: on top of that, mercenaries can also obtain materials from the carcasses of monsters.
second_translate: on top of that, mercenaries can also obtain materials from the carcasses of monsters.
label: moreover, there are various resources that can be salvaged from these demonic creatures.

hangle: 그걸 팔면 종에 따라 많은 수익을 얻을 수도 있다.
first_translate: they can earn a lot of money by selling those materials.
second_translate: They can earn a lot of money depending on the type if they sell those materials.
label: depending on  the monster, one could sell them and make quite the profit.

hangle: 결국 각자의 이득을 좇아 모여 있다는 뜻이다.
first_translate: in the end, it means that everyone is gathered here for their own benefit.
second_translate: In the end, it means that everyone has gathered here in pursuit of their own benefit.
label: in other words,  both sides had something to gain.

first_translate: heylon needs military power to protect the territory,
second_translate: Heylon needs military force to protect the territory.
label: duke heylon  needed manpower to protect his domain,

first_translate: and the mercenaries need money.
second_translate: The mercenaries gathered because they needed money.
label: and the mercenaries needed the money.

first_translate: if you continue to refuse to choose,
second_translate: if you continue to refuse to choose...
label: if you keep on refusing to decide,

first_translate: I will choose for you.
second_translate: ...I will choose for you.
label: I’ll decide for you.

first_translate: untie me right now!
second_translate: Untie this right now!
label: you’d  better untie us right now!!

hangle: 추운 날씨에 광장에 모인 사람들을 위해서도 빨리 끝내자.
first_translate: let’s finish this quickly for the sake of the people gathered in the cold.
second_translate: Let's finish this quickly for the sake of the people gathered in the plaza in this cold weather.
label: let’s hurry  up and get this over with. all those people are waiting in the cold.

first_translate: to be honest, I’ve been shivering for a while now.
second_translate: to be honest, I’ve been shivering for a while now...
label: I’m also starting to feel pretty chilly.

first_translate: the people are strangely quiet.
second_translate: ...the people are strangely quiet...
label: that’s odd...  the townspeople have suddenly gone quiet,

hangle: 기분탓인지 주위 온도가 2도쯤 내려간 것 같은데….
first_translate: it might be my imagination, but it feels like the temperature has dropped by two degrees...
second_translate: ...it might be my imagination, but it feels like the temperature has dropped by two degrees...
label: and it feels like  the temperature has dropped by a couple of degrees…

first_translate: what is he going to choose?
second_translate: What are they going to choose?
label: so, what is  your decision?

first_translate: oh...
second_translate: oh...
label: oh…

first_translate: abel?!
second_translate: abel?!
label: abel?!

first_translate: so that’s why the temperature dropped!
second_translate: Abel is the reason the temperature dropped here.
label: no wonder it suddenly got so cold!

first_translate: it feels like a cold wind is blowing just from his presence...
second_translate: it feels like a cold wind is blowing just from his presence...
label: his presence alone brings chills to those around him...

first_translate: your grace, what are you doing here?
second_translate: Your Grace, why are you here?
label: what are  you doing here, your grace?

hangle: 내 영지를 돌아보는데 이유가 필요하지는 않겠지.
first_translate: I don’t need a reason to look around my own territory, do I?
second_translate: I don’t need a reason to look around my own territory, do I?
label: do I need  a reason to come look after my own domain?

first_translate: I’m sorry...
second_translate: I’m sorry...
label: I’m sorry, lady fiona…

first_translate: I see...
second_translate: I see...
label: I see…

first_translate: oh!
second_translate: oh!
label: ah!

hangle: 그래서 저놈들에게 어떤 선택권을 준 거지?
first_translate: so what options did you give those bastards?
second_translate: so what options did you give those bastards?
label: what choices  did you give the perpetrators?

first_translate: um...
second_translate: um...
label: well...

first_translate: I’m just asking,
second_translate: Just to be sure, let me ask you something.
label: just out of curiosity,

first_translate: but how much did you hear?
second_translate: Where did you start listening from?
label: how much did you overhear?

first_translate: hah...
second_translate: hah...
label: ah, yes...

first_translate: I heard from the part where they called us “barbaric and uncivilized northerners.”
second_translate: I started listening from the part where they said, “those barbaric and uncivilized northerners.”
label: from the part  where he said, “savage and ignorant northerners.”

first_translate: oh... they’re screwed.
second_translate: oh... they’re screwed.
label: yeah... they’re screwed.

first_translate: if they’re lucky, they’ll only be half-dead.
second_translate: If they had been lucky, they would have ended up only half-dead.
label: they’re lucky  if they even get out of this  alive.

first_translate: I gave them two options.
second_translate: I told them to choose between the two options.
label: I told them to choose between two options.

first_translate: they can either leave the castle walls with nothing but the clothes on their backs,
second_translate: they can either leave the castle walls with nothing but the clothes on their backs...
label: they can either leave this place unarmed and without any supplies,

hangle: 그…. 번식 기능이 있는 신체를 자르는 거.
first_translate: or... cut off the part of their body that allows them to reproduce.
second_translate: ...or cut off the part of their body that allows them to reproduce.
label: or... have  their external reproductive organs chopped off.

first_translate: I like both options.
second_translate: I like both options.
label: I like  the sound of both.

first_translate: but why did you give them a choice?
second_translate: but why did you give them a choice?
label: but why are you letting them choose?

hangle: 그야…. 둘 다 하는 건 가혹해 보이니까,
first_translate: well... it seemed harsh to make them do both,
second_translate: well... it seemed harsh to make them do both...
label: I thought it  would be a little ruthless to carry out both,

first_translate: so I was trying to be considerate.
second_translate: ...so I was trying to be considerate.
label: so it  was my way of showing them mercy.

first_translate: that was unnecessary.
second_translate: that was unnecessary.
label: mercy is lost on them.

first_translate: fiona, I’ve always told you...
second_translate: fiona, I’ve always told you...
label: like I always say, fiona.

hangle: 이 헤일론에서 감히 내 영지민에게 손을 대는 버러지들은….
first_translate: ...that the scum who dare to lay a hand on the people of my territory...
second_translate: ...the scum who dare to lay a hand on the people of my territory...
label: half-witted bastards who have the gall to lay their hands on my people in heylon...

first_translate: ugh?!
second_translate: What?!
label: ngh!!

first_translate: ...don’t deserve any consideration.
second_translate: ...don’t deserve any consideration.
label: …don’t deserve mercy.

first_translate: aah...
second_translate: aah...
label: aaaah!!!

hangle: 안겨있는 나도 소름이 돋을 정도의 살기야….
first_translate: I’m getting chills from the murderous aura he’s giving off...
second_translate: I’m getting chills from the murderous aura he’s giving off...
label: even I can  feel the bloodlust rolling off of abel right now...

hangle: 감히 내가 다스리는 영지를 야만적이라 칭했으니,
first_translate: they dared to call my territory barbaric,
second_translate: they dared to call my territory barbaric...
label: you said northerners are savages,

hangle: 그 기대에 응해 주는 게 예의겠지.
first_translate: so it would be polite to meet their expectations.
second_translate: ...so it would be polite to meet their expectations.
label: so I suppose  it’s only right that I meet your expectations.

first_translate: apply both punishments.
second_translate: Apply both punishments.
label: carry out both punishments.

hangle: 죄의 원인이 된 신체 부위는 자르고,
first_translate: cut off the body part that caused the crime,
second_translate: Cut off the body part that caused the crime.
label: have all of them emasculated...

first_translate: and then chase them out of the castle walls.
second_translate: Have the soldiers drive them out beyond the castle walls afterward.
label: …before  throwing them beyond the fourth rampart.

first_translate: now, begin the execution.
second_translate: Then, begin the execution.
label: you may begin now.

first_translate: yes, your grace!
second_translate: yes!
label: yes, your grace!

first_translate: fiona.
second_translate: Fiona.
label: fiona.

first_translate: don’t waste your time worrying about unnecessary things next time.
second_translate: Don't trouble yourself with useless worries next time.
label: next time,  don’t worry about such trifling matters.

hangle: 일단 사람 목숨이 왔다 갔다 하는 결정이었던 것 같은데….
first_translate: but it seemed like a decision that could determine whether they lived or died...
second_translate: but it seemed like a decision that could determine whether they lived or died...
label: since when  was dealing  with people’s lives a trifling matter?

first_translate: yes, your grace.
second_translate: I understand, Your Grace.
label: okay, your grace.

first_translate: abel, you dangerous man.
second_translate: abel, this dangerous guy.
label: abel is  a dangerous one.

first_translate: huh...?
second_translate: huh...?
label: huh?

hangle: 그래서 결국, 이 성격 더러운 아벨이 왜 굳이 여기까지 온 거지?
first_translate: so why did this ill-tempered abel come all the way here?
second_translate: so why did this ill-tempered abel come all the way here?
label: why did  the bad-tempered abel come all  the way here, anyway?
